MCU Chronological Order

Source: https://www.imdb.com/list/ls029032797/

  • Captain America: The First Avenger

    March 1942-May 1945 April 2011 (Present Day)

  • Marvel One-Shot: Agent Carter

    March 1946

  • Agent Carter

    April-May 1946 / Season 1 July 1947 / Season 2

  • Captain Marvel

    June 1995

  • Iron Man

    January-May 2008

  • Iron Man 2

    May-June 2011

    June 2011

    June 2011

    July 2011

    May 2012

    May 2012

    December 2012
